bibl.title: The Chronology of the Eastern Chapels in the Upper Church at Banganarti: Some Observations on the Genesis of ""Apse Portraits"" in Nubian Royal Iconography.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Follows the evolution of royal power through the prism of its imagery, comparing the Banganarti set with earlier royal portraits from Faras and Old Dongola. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Magdalena M. Woźniak, The Chronology of the Eastern Chapels in the Upper Church at Banganarti: Some Observations on the Genesis of ""Apse Portraits"" in Nubian Royal Iconography.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 629-646, 11 figg.
Follows the evolution of royal power through the prism of its imagery, comparing the Banganarti set with earlier royal portraits from Faras and Old Dongola. - Avec résumé en anglais.
